name: Export Options
description:
Export settings inheritance and more: an easy-to-use plugin that makes setting up export options for nodes super easy.


Commands

  1. @1x, @2x, @3x, SVG, PDF -> Applies all the standard export settings for the selected nodes.
  2. @1x, @2x, @3x -> Applies pixel (PNG) export settings for the selected nodes.
  3. SVG, PDF -> Applies vector export settings for the selected nodes.
  4. Remove -> Removes export settings for the selected nodes.
  5. Infer all -> Copies export settings to instances based on their main component. No selection is needed.


Crafted with love at Halcyon Mobile
